content.text: Match ends, Swansea City 4, West Ham United 1.
Second Half ends, Swansea City 4, West Ham United 1.
Substitution, Swansea City. Tammy Abraham replaces Sam Clucas.
Chicharito (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alfie Mawson (Swansea City).
Offside, West Ham United. Mark Noble tries a through ball, but Michail Antonio is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Michail Antonio (West Ham United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Chicharito.
Attempt blocked. Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Jordan Ayew (Swansea City).
Michail Antonio (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, West Ham United. Michail Antonio tries a through ball, but Marko Arnautovic is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Sam Byram (West Ham United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Substitution, Swansea City. Tom Carroll replaces Andy King.
Attempt blocked. Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Sam Clucas (Swansea City).
Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Goal!  Swansea City 4, West Ham United 1. Michail Antonio (West Ham United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Aaron Cresswell following a set piece situation.
Substitution, Swansea City. Nathan Dyer replaces André Ayew.
Foul by Kyle Naughton (Swansea City).
Michail Antonio (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Goal!  Swansea City 3, West Ham United 0. Andy King (Swansea City) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal following a corner.
Attempt saved. André Ayew (Swansea City) header from very close range is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Sam Clucas with a cross.

Offside, West Ham United. Chicharito tries a through ball, but Marko Arnautovic is caught offside.
